about_the_game:
The soundtrack for Drunken Wrestlers 2 consists of heavy bass music.

Purchasing this DLC will give you a special Supporter title in game + an exclusive cosmetic item. Using it is optional.

Make sure to download and install this soundtrack if you want to receive the items.

Contents:


01. Pvndorum88 - Main Theme [Dubstep]
02. Shalkii - Unity [Synthwave/Dubstep]
03. Shalkii - Overheat [Dubstep]
04. Skymo - Alone [Future Bass]
05. Skymo - Crossed Out [Dubstep]
06. Skymo - Meow [Glitch Hop]
07. Skymo - Dopamine [Electro House]
08. Skymo - Jolly Roger [Dubstep]
09. Skymo - The Hero [Dubstep]
10. SkutteOleg - Shadows [Drumstep]

+ 12 unfinished/WIP tracks

Format: .mp3, 320 kbps
